metadata.name: CryptoGRLs #004 - Slimy
metadata.description:
Meet Slimy one of the most fun and flexible anime monster girl in the GryptoGRLs Universe. She is outgoing and excited to meet new people. Her favorite activity is swimming and she can totally dissolve in that process! :D

That is the fourth CryptoGRL that will appear in our collection and the future dating-sim game. She has a very gentle and soft character and an easy-going persona.

She is a manager of the swimming pool in the Metaverse. Hope you will enjoy her company which she teaches you some serious swimming moves.

This is a unique 1/1 original animated NFT & voiced artwork, part of the CryptoGRLs collection.

Upon purchase you have an option of unlocking another 1/1 NFT, more info on that is available on our website!
